alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued May 28 at 2:42AM PDT until May 28 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. Waves 2 to 4 feet. * WHERE...Walker, Greater Lake Tahoe Area, Tahoe, Donner, Fallen Leaf, Prosser and Boca and Topaz, Bridgeport, Mono, and Crowley. * WHEN...From 11 AM to 11 PM PDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds may lead to travel restrictions for RVs, trailers, and other high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.

area.areaDesc: Greater Lake Tahoe Area; Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties
